mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.TITLE as stat_name, COUNT(*) as stat_count FROM TB_MOVIE m JOIN TB_POST p ON m.movie_id = p.movie_id WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{day}) <= p.create_at AND p.create_at <= TRUNC(SYSDATE + 1) GROUP BY m.title ORDER BY stat_count DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.TITLE as stat_name, COUNT(*) as stat_count FROM TB_MOVIE m JOIN TB_REPLY r ON m.movie_id = r.movie_id WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{day}) <= r.create_at AND r.create_at <= TRUNC(SYSDATE + 1) GROUP BY m.title ORDER BY stat_count DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT mc.CATEGORY_ID AS stat_name, SUM(stat_count) AS stat_count FROM MP_MOVIE_CATEGORY mc JOIN ( SELECT m.MOVIE_ID, COUNT(*) AS stat_count FROM TB_MOVIE m JOIN TB_POST p ON m.MOVIE_ID = p.MOVIE_ID WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{day}) <= p.create_at AND p.create_at <= TRUNC(SYSDATE + 1) GROUP BY m.MOVIE_ID UNION ALL SELECT m.MOVIE_ID, COUNT(*) AS stat_count FROM TB_MOVIE m JOIN TB_REPLY r ON m.MOVIE_ID = r.MOVIE_ID WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{day}) <= r.create_at AND r.create_at <= TRUNC(SYSDATE + 1) GROUP BY m.MOVIE_ID ) stat ON mc.MOVIE_ID = stat.MOVIE_ID GROUP BY mc.CATEGORY_ID ORDER BY stat_count DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
